name: 3NGL
description:
3NGL is a puzzle game where you should try to fit figures
into the game board to form lines of triangles.

Complete lines automatically erase and give you score.

You can score horizontal and/or diagonal lines.

More triangles in the line means more score for you.

FEATURES
- 3 difficulty levels / board sizes
- 10+ levels on each difficulty level
- 30+ different figures to fit

3NGL is addicting and brain refreshing.

If you install it you would love it!
